song_name: All My Friends - Wave Racer Remix
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, All My Friends - Wave Racer Remix is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
All My Friends - Wave Racer Remix is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music. 

See the C Major Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
